title: Lebanese Bulghur Wheat and Feta Salad
ingredients: ['200g bulghur wheat', '600ml boiling water', '125g green beans, halved', '2 tbsp olive oil', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1 tsp each ground cinnamon, cumin and coriander', '25g chives, snipped', '10g fresh coriander, chopped', '10g fresh mint, chopped', '12 stoned black olives, sliced', '3 tbsp sliced marinated or roasted peppers', '1 beef tomato, chopped, or 250g cherry tomatoes, halved', '150g feta cheese, crumbled']
